00284   class Iterator{
00285     //Only the method iterator of data has access to the private part of Iterator,
00286     //the constructor of Iterator being private, only this method con create a new Iterator
00287     friend Iterator Data::iterator(dataType clusterId);
00288     
00289     public:
00290     inline ~Iterator(){};
00300     inline QPoint operator()(dataType dimensionX, dataType dimensionY) const{
00301       dataType featuresRowIndex = (*data.spikesByCluster)(1,index);
00302       return QPoint(data.features(featuresRowIndex,dimensionX),
00303                     - data.features(featuresRowIndex,dimensionY));
00304     };
00310     inline dataType operator()(dataType dimension) const{
00311       return data.features((*data.spikesByCluster)(1,index),dimension);
00312     };
00314     inline void next(){index++;};
00316     inline bool hasNext(){return (lastIndex >= index);};
00317 
00318     private:
00319       inline Iterator(dataType clusterId, const Data& d):data(d),clusterId(clusterId){                      
00320         ClusterInfo clusterInfo = (*data.clusterInfoMap)[clusterId];
00321         index = clusterInfo.firstSpikePosition();
00322         lastIndex = index + clusterInfo.nbSpikes() - 1;
00323       };
00327       const Data& data;
00328       dataType clusterId;
00329       dataType index;
00330       dataType lastIndex;
00331   };
00332 
00334   inline QValueList<dataType> clusterIds(){
00335     return clusterInfoMap->keys();

00375 
00377   inline long maxTime(){
00378     double maximumTimeInRecordingUnits = static_cast<double>(maxDimension(nbDimensions));
00379     //the cast takes the non floating part, to include the last record we add 1.
00380     double maxTimeInS = static_cast<double>(maximumTimeInRecordingUnits * samplingInterval) / static_cast<double>(1000000);
00381     
00382     return static_cast<long>(floor(0.5 + maxTimeInS));
00383   }

00426   inline int nbOfClusters(){
00427    mutex.lock();
00428    int nbClusters = clusterInfoMap->count();
00429    mutex.unlock();
00430 
00431    return nbClusters;
00432  }

00442  inline void setUserClusterInformation(int clusterId, QString structure,
00443  QString  type,QString ID, QString quality, QString notes){ 
00444       if((*clusterInfoMap).contains(static_cast<dataType>(clusterId))){
00445            ClusterInfo currentClusterInfo = (*clusterInfoMap)[static_cast<dataType>(clusterId)];
00446            
00447            currentClusterInfo.setStructure(structure);
00448            currentClusterInfo.setType(type);
00449            currentClusterInfo.setId(ID);
00450            currentClusterInfo.setQuality(quality);
00451            currentClusterInfo.setNotes(notes);
00452 
00453            clusterInfoMap->insert(static_cast<dataType>(clusterId),currentClusterInfo);         
00454       }    
00455   }
00456 
00466   inline void getUserClusterInformation(int clusterId,vector<QString>& clusterInformation){
00467        
00468        if((*clusterInfoMap).contains(static_cast<dataType>(clusterId))){
00469              ClusterInfo currentClusterInfo = (*clusterInfoMap)[static_cast<dataType>(clusterId)];
00470                
00471                clusterInformation.push_back(currentClusterInfo.getStructure());
00472                clusterInformation.push_back(currentClusterInfo.getType());
00473                clusterInformation.push_back(currentClusterInfo.getId());
00474                clusterInformation.push_back(currentClusterInfo.getQuality());
00475                clusterInformation.push_back(currentClusterInfo.getNotes());
00476           }
00477      }

00618   class ClusterInfo {
00619 
00620     public:
00621            inline ClusterInfo(QString pStructure = "",QString pType = "",QString pID = "",QString pQuality = "",QString pNotes = ""):structure(pStructure),type(pType),ID(pID),quality(pQuality),notes(pNotes){};
00622            inline ClusterInfo(dataType position, dataType nb,QString pStructure = "",QString pType = "",QString pID = "",QString pQuality = "",QString pNotes =""):position(position),spikeNb(nb),structure(pStructure),type(pType),ID(pID),quality(pQuality),notes(pNotes){};
00623       inline ~ClusterInfo(){};
00624       inline dataType firstSpikePosition() const {return position;};
00625       inline dataType nbSpikes() const {return spikeNb;};
00626       inline void setNbSpikes(dataType nbSpikes){spikeNb = nbSpikes;};
00627       inline void setFirstSpikePosition(dataType position){this->position = position;};
00628                 
00629           inline QString getStructure() const { return structure; };
00630           inline QString getType() const { return type; };
00631           inline QString getId() const { return ID; };
00632           inline QString getQuality() const { return quality; };
00633           inline QString getNotes() const { return notes; };
00634 
00635           inline void setStructure(QString pStructure) { structure = pStructure; };
00636           inline void setType(QString pType) { type = pType; };
00637           inline void setId(QString pId) { ID = pId; };
00638           inline void setQuality(QString pQuality) { quality = pQuality; };
00639           inline void setNotes(QString pNotes) { notes = pNotes; };
00640           
00641     private:
00642     dataType position;
00643     dataType spikeNb;
00644

00646       QString       type;
00648       QString       ID;
00649       QString       quality;

00700   enum WaveformMode{SAMPLE=1,TIME_FRAME=2};
00701 
00702   class WaveformStatus{
00703      public:
00704        inline WaveformStatus(Status sample = NOT_AVAILABLE,Status timeFrame = NOT_AVAILABLE,Status sampleMean = NOT_AVAILABLE,Status timeFrameMean = NOT_AVAILABLE )
00705        :sample(sample),timeFrame(timeFrame),sampleMean(sampleMean),timeFrameMean(timeFrameMean){
00706         clusterModified = false; 
00707        };
00708        inline WaveformStatus(const WaveformStatus& s):sample(s.sample),timeFrame(s.timeFrame),sampleMean(s.sampleMean),timeFrameMean(s.timeFrameMean), clusterModified(s.clusterModified){};
00709        inline ~WaveformStatus(){};
00710        inline void setSampleStatus(Status status){sample = status;};
00711        inline Status sampleStatus() const {return sample;};
00712        inline void setTimeFrameStatus(Status status){timeFrame = status;};
00713        inline Status timeFrameStatus() const {return timeFrame;};
00714        inline void setSampleMeanStatus(Status status){sampleMean = status;};
00715        inline Status sampleMeanStatus() const {return sampleMean;};
00716        inline void setTimeFrameMeanStatus(Status status){timeFrameMean = status;};
00717        inline Status timeFrameMeanStatus() const {return timeFrameMean;};
00718        inline bool isInProcess() const {
00719         if(sample == IN_PROCESS || timeFrame == IN_PROCESS || sampleMean == IN_PROCESS || timeFrameMean == IN_PROCESS) return true;
00720         else return false;
00721        };
00722        inline void setClusterModified(bool modified){clusterModified = modified;};
00723        inline bool isClusterModified()  const {return clusterModified;};
00724      private:
00725        Status sample;
00726        Status timeFrame;
00727        Status sampleMean;
00728        Status timeFrameMean;
00729        bool clusterModified;
00730   };

00739   class Waveforms{
00740 
00741     public:
00742       virtual inline ~Waveforms(){};
00743       inline dataType indexOfTimeEnd() const {return timeEndIndex;};
00744       inline void setIndexOfTimeEnd(dataType index){timeEndIndex = index;};
00745       inline dataType startTime() const {return timeStart;};
00746       inline void setStartTime(dataType time){timeStart = time;};
00747       inline dataType endTime() const {return timeEnd;};
00748       inline void setEndTime(dataType time){timeEnd = time;};
00749       inline dataType nbOfSpikes(WaveformMode waveformMode){
00750         mode = waveformMode;
00751         if(waveformMode == SAMPLE) return nbSampleSpikes;
00752         else return nbTimeFrameSpikes;
00753       };
00754       inline dataType nbOfSpikesAsked() const {return nbSpikesAsked;};
00755       inline void setNbOfSpikesAsked(dataType nb) {nbSpikesAsked = nb;};
00756       inline void setMode(WaveformMode waveformMode){mode = waveformMode;};
00757       
00758       virtual void setSize(dataType size,WaveformMode waveformMode) = 0;
00759       virtual dataType getSample(dataType index) const = 0;
00760       virtual dataType getTimeFrame(dataType index) const  = 0;
00761       virtual dataType getSampleMean(dataType index) const  = 0;
00762       virtual dataType getTimeFrameMean(dataType index) const  = 0;
00763       virtual dataType getSampleStDeviation(dataType index) const  = 0;
00764       virtual dataType getTimeFrameStDeviation(dataType index) const  = 0;
00765       virtual void read(SortableTable& positionOfSpikes,dataType nbSpikesOfCluster,FILE* spikeFile,dataType nbSpkToDisplay) = 0;
00766       virtual void read(SortableTable& positionOfSpikes,dataType nbSpikesOfCluster,FILE* spikeFile,dataType& currentSpikeIndex,dataType end) = 0;
00767       virtual void calculateMean(WaveformMode waveformMode) = 0;
00768 
00769     protected:
00770       inline Waveforms(Data& d,dataType nbSampleSpikes = 0,dataType nbTimeFrameSpikes = 0,dataType index = 0,dataType startTime = 0,dataType endTime = 0):data(d){
00771        timeEndIndex = index;
00772        timeStart = startTime;
00773        timeEnd = endTime;
00774        nbPtsBySpike = data.nbChannels * data.nbSamplesInWaveform;
00775        nbSpikesAsked = 0;
00776        };
00777 
00778     protected:
00779       Data& data;
00780       dataType timeEndIndex;
00781       dataType timeStart;
00782       dataType timeEnd;
00783       dataType nbSampleSpikes;
00784       dataType nbTimeFrameSpikes;
00785       WaveformMode mode;
00786       int nbPtsBySpike;
00787       dataType nbSpikesAsked;
00788   } ;

00800   template <class T>
00801   class WaveformData : public Waveforms {
00802 
00803     public:
00804       inline WaveformData(Data& d,dataType nbSampleSpikes = 0,dataType nbTimeFrameSpikes = 0,dataType index = 0,dataType startTime = 0,dataType endTime = 0):
00805        Waveforms(d,nbSampleSpikes,nbTimeFrameSpikes,index,startTime,endTime){
00806        sampleSpikesTable = 0L;
00807        timeFrameSpikesTable = 0L;
00808        sampleMeanTable = 0L;
00809        timeFrameMeanTable = 0L;
00810        sampleStDeviationTable = 0L;
00811        timeFrameStDeviationTable = 0L;
00812       };
00813       inline ~WaveformData(){
00814         if(sampleSpikesTable != 0L) delete []sampleSpikesTable;
00815         if(timeFrameSpikesTable != 0L) delete []timeFrameSpikesTable;
00816         if(sampleMeanTable != 0L) delete []sampleMeanTable;
00817         if(timeFrameMeanTable != 0L) delete []timeFrameMeanTable;
00818         if(sampleStDeviationTable != 0L) delete []sampleStDeviationTable;
00819         if(timeFrameStDeviationTable != 0L) delete []timeFrameStDeviationTable;
00820       };
00822       void setSize(dataType size,WaveformMode waveformMode = SAMPLE);
00823       inline dataType getSample(dataType index) const {
00824         return static_cast<dataType>(sampleSpikesTable[index]);
00825       };
00826       inline dataType getTimeFrame(dataType index) const {
00827         return static_cast<dataType>(timeFrameSpikesTable[index]);
00828       };
00829       inline dataType getSampleMean(dataType index) const {
00830         return static_cast<dataType>(sampleMeanTable[index]);
00831       };
00832       inline dataType getTimeFrameMean(dataType index) const {
00833         return static_cast<dataType>(timeFrameMeanTable[index]);
00834       };
00835       inline dataType getSampleStDeviation(dataType index) const {
00836         return static_cast<dataType>(sampleStDeviationTable[index]);
00837       };
00838       inline dataType getTimeFrameStDeviation(dataType index) const {
00839         return static_cast<dataType>(timeFrameStDeviationTable[index]);
00840       };
00841       void read(SortableTable& positionOfSpikes,dataType currentSpikeIndex,FILE* spikeFile,dataType nbSpkToDisplay);
00842       void read(SortableTable& positionOfSpikes,dataType nbSpikesOfCluster,FILE* spikeFile,dataType& currentSpikeIndex,dataType end);
00843       void calculateMean(WaveformMode waveformMode = SAMPLE);
00844     private:
00845       T* sampleSpikesTable;
00846       T* timeFrameSpikesTable;
00847       T* sampleMeanTable;
00848       T* timeFrameMeanTable;
00849       T* sampleStDeviationTable;
00850       T* timeFrameStDeviationTable;
00851   } ;

00876   class CorrelationsInProcess{
00877 
00878     public:
00879       inline CorrelationsInProcess(){};
00880       inline ~CorrelationsInProcess(){};
00881       inline void addProcess(dataType clusterId){
00882         if(clusters.contains(clusterId)) clusters[clusterId]++;
00883         else {
00884          clusters.insert(clusterId,1);
00885          clustersModified.insert(clusterId,false);
00886         }
00887       };
00888       inline void removeProcess(dataType clusterId){
00889         if(clusters.contains(clusterId) && clusters[clusterId] > 1)clusters[clusterId]--;
00890         else if(clusters.contains(clusterId) && clusters[clusterId] == 1){
00891          clusters.remove(clusterId);
00892          clustersModified.remove(clusterId);
00893         }
00894       };
00895       inline void removeCluster(dataType clusterId){
00896        clusters.remove(clusterId);
00897        clustersModified.remove(clusterId); 
00898       };
00899       inline bool contains(dataType clusterId) const {return clusters.contains(clusterId);};
00900 
00901       inline void setClusterModified(dataType clusterId,bool modified){clustersModified[clusterId] = modified;};
00902       inline bool isClusterModified(dataType clusterId)  const {return clustersModified[clusterId];};
00903 
00904     private:
00905     QMap<dataType,int> clusters;
00906     QMap<dataType,bool> clustersModified;
00907   } ;
00908 
00911  CorrelationsInProcess correlationsInProcess;
00912                                                                            
00913  class Correlation;
00914  friend class Correlation;
00915 
00919   class Correlation{
00920 
00921     public:
00922       inline Correlation(Data& d):data(d){
00923         reset();
00924       };
00925       inline Correlation(Data& d,int size,int timeWindow):data(d),binSize(size),timeFrame(timeWindow){
00926          values = 0L;
00927          max = 0;
00928          asymptote = 0;
00929          nbBins = 0;
00930          firingRate = 0;
00931       };
00932       inline ~Correlation(){
00933        if(values != 0L) delete []values;
00934       };
00935       inline void reset(){
00936         if(values != 0L) delete []values;
00937         values = 0L;
00938         max = 0;
00939         asymptote = 0;
00940         binSize = 0;
00941         timeFrame = 0;
00942         nbBins = 0;
00943         firingRate = 0;
00944       };
00945       inline void setStatus(Status s){status = s;};
00946       inline Status getStatus() const {return status;};
00947       inline Status getStatus(int size,int timeWindow) const {
00948         if(binSize != size || timeFrame != timeWindow) return NOT_AVAILABLE;
00949         else return status;
00950       };
00952       inline int getBinSize() const {return binSize;};
00953       inline void setBinSize(int size){binSize = size;};
00955       inline int getTimeWindow() const {return timeFrame;};
00956       inline void setTimeWindow(int timeWindow){timeFrame = timeWindow;};      
00957       inline uint getMaximum() const {return max;};
00958       inline void setMaximum(uint m){max = m;};
00959       inline float getShoulder() const {return asymptote;};
00960       inline void setShoulder(float s){asymptote = s;};
00961       void calculateCorrelation(SortableTable& spikesOfCluster1,SortableTable& spikesOfCluster2,double binSizeInRU,double timeWindowInRU,int halfBins,bool autoCorrelogram);
00962       inline int getNbBins(){return nbBins;};
00963       inline void setNbBins(int nb){nbBins = nb;};
00964       inline uint getValue(int index){return values[index];};
00965       inline float getFiringRate() const {return firingRate;};
00966

00976       float firingRate;

01143   class WaveformIterator{
01144     public:
01145      virtual ~WaveformIterator(){};
01146      inline void setSpikesAvailable(bool available){spikesAvailable = available;};
01147      inline bool areSpikesAvailable(){return spikesAvailable;};
01148      inline void setMeanAvailable(bool available){meanAvailable = available;};
01149      inline bool isMeanAvailable(){return meanAvailable;};
01150       virtual inline dataType nextSpike(){return 0;};
01151      virtual inline dataType nextMeanValue(){return 0;};
01152      virtual inline dataType nextStDeviationValue(){return 0;};
01153      virtual inline dataType nbOfSpikes() const{return 0;};
01154 
01155     inline WaveformIterator(){init();};
01156     
01157     protected:
01158       inline WaveformIterator(Waveforms* waveformsData){
01159        init();
01160        waveforms = waveformsData;
01161       };
01162       inline void init(){
01163        waveforms = 0L;
01164        spikesIndex = -1;
01165        meanIndex = -1;
01166        stDeviationIndex = -1;
01167        spikesAvailable = false;
01168        meanAvailable = false;
01169       };
01170 
01171      Waveforms* waveforms;
01172      dataType spikesIndex;
01173      dataType meanIndex;
01174      dataType stDeviationIndex;
01175      bool spikesAvailable;
01176      bool meanAvailable;
01177   };

01181   class SampleWaveformIterator;
01182   friend class SampleWaveformIterator;
01183 
01192   inline SampleWaveformIterator* sampleWaveformIterator(dataType clusterId,dataType nbSampleSpikes){
01193     QString clusterIdString = QString("%1").arg(clusterId);
01194     int clusterIdInt = static_cast<int>(clusterId);
01195     SampleWaveformIterator* waveformIterator;
01196 
01197     if(waveformStatusMap.contains(clusterIdInt)){
01198      Waveforms* waveforms = waveformDict[clusterIdString];
01199      waveformIterator = new SampleWaveformIterator(waveforms);     
01200      if(waveformStatusMap[clusterIdInt].sampleMeanStatus() == READY) waveformIterator->setMeanAvailable(true);
01201      if(waveformStatusMap[clusterIdInt].sampleStatus() == READY){
01202       waveformIterator->setSpikesAvailable(true);
01203       waveformIterator->updateStatus(nbSampleSpikes);
01204      }
01205     }
01206     else{
01207      //No data are available, create any of the iterator (they will have their
01208      //data availability booleans to false).
01209      //The case is for security reason but should never be reach.
01210      waveformIterator = new SampleWaveformIterator();
01211      }
01212     return waveformIterator;
01213   }
01214   
01223   class SampleWaveformIterator: public WaveformIterator{
01224     //Only the method iterator of data has access to the protected part of Iterator,
01225     //the constructor of Iterator being private, only this method con create a new Iterator
01226     friend SampleWaveformIterator* Data::sampleWaveformIterator(dataType clusterId,dataType nbSampleSpikes);
01227 
01228     public:
01229      inline ~SampleWaveformIterator(){};
01230      inline dataType nextSpike(){
01231       ++spikesIndex;
01232       return - static_cast<dataType>(waveforms->getSample(spikesIndex));
01233      };
01234      inline dataType nextMeanValue(){
01235       ++meanIndex;
01236       return - static_cast<dataType>(waveforms->getSampleMean(meanIndex));
01237      };
01238      inline dataType nextStDeviationValue(){
01239       ++stDeviationIndex;
01240       return - static_cast<dataType>(waveforms->getSampleStDeviation(stDeviationIndex));
01241      };
01242      inline dataType nbOfSpikes() const{
01243       return waveforms->nbOfSpikes(SAMPLE);
01244      };
01245     private:
01246      inline SampleWaveformIterator(): WaveformIterator(){};
01247      inline SampleWaveformIterator(Waveforms* waveformsData): WaveformIterator(waveformsData){};
01248      inline void updateStatus(dataType nbSampleSpikes){
01249        if(waveforms->nbOfSpikesAsked() != nbSampleSpikes){
01250         setSpikesAvailable(false);
01251         setMeanAvailable(false); 
01252        }
01253      };
01254 
01255   };

01257   class TimeFrameWaveformIterator;
01258   friend class TimeFrameWaveformIterator;
01259 
01269   inline TimeFrameWaveformIterator* timeFrameWaveformIterator(dataType clusterId,dataType startTime,dataType endTime){
01270     QString clusterIdString = QString("%1").arg(clusterId);
01271     int clusterIdInt = static_cast<int>(clusterId);
01272     TimeFrameWaveformIterator* waveformIterator;
01273 
01274     if(waveformStatusMap.contains(clusterIdInt)){
01275      Waveforms* waveforms = waveformDict[clusterIdString];
01276       waveformIterator = new TimeFrameWaveformIterator(waveforms);
01277       if(waveformStatusMap[clusterIdInt].timeFrameMeanStatus() == READY) waveformIterator->setMeanAvailable(true);
01278       if(waveformStatusMap[clusterIdInt].timeFrameStatus() == READY){
01279        waveformIterator->setSpikesAvailable(true);
01280        waveformIterator->updateStatus(startTime,endTime);
01281       }
01282     }
01283     else{
01284      //No data are available, create any of the iterator (they will have their
01285      //data availability booleans to false).
01286      //The case is for security reason but should never be reach.
01287      waveformIterator = new TimeFrameWaveformIterator();
01288     }
01289     return waveformIterator;
01290   }
01291 
01300   class TimeFrameWaveformIterator: public WaveformIterator{
01301     //Only the method iterator of data has access to the protected part of Iterator,
01302     //the constructor of Iterator being private, only this method con create a new Iterator
01303     friend TimeFrameWaveformIterator* Data::timeFrameWaveformIterator(dataType clusterId,dataType startTime,dataType endTime);
01304 
01305     public:
01306      inline ~TimeFrameWaveformIterator(){};
01307      inline dataType nextSpike(){
01308       ++spikesIndex;
01309       return - static_cast<dataType>(waveforms->getTimeFrame(spikesIndex));
01310      };
01311      inline dataType nextMeanValue(){
01312       ++meanIndex;
01313       return - static_cast<dataType>(waveforms->getTimeFrameMean(meanIndex));
01314      };
01315      inline dataType nextStDeviationValue(){
01316       ++stDeviationIndex;
01317       return - static_cast<dataType>(waveforms->getTimeFrameStDeviation(stDeviationIndex));
01318      };
01319      inline dataType nbOfSpikes() const{
01320       return waveforms->nbOfSpikes(TIME_FRAME);
01321      };
01322 
01323     private:
01324      inline TimeFrameWaveformIterator(): WaveformIterator(){};
01325      inline TimeFrameWaveformIterator(Waveforms* waveformsData): WaveformIterator(waveformsData){};
01326      inline void updateStatus(dataType start,dataType end){
01327        if(waveforms->startTime() != start || waveforms->endTime() != end){
01328         setSpikesAvailable(false);
01329         setMeanAvailable(false);
01330        }
01331      };
01332      
01333    };

01348   class CorrelogramIterator;
01349   friend class CorrelogramIterator;
01350 
01359   inline CorrelogramIterator correlogramIterator(Pair pair,ScaleMode scale,int binSize,int timeframe){
01360     return CorrelogramIterator(*this,pair,scale,binSize,timeframe);
01361   };
01362 
01372   class CorrelogramIterator{
01373     //Only the method correlogramIterator of data has access to the private part of CorrelogramIterator,
01374     //the constructor of CorrelogramIterator being private, only this method con create a new CorrelogramIterator
01375     friend CorrelogramIterator Data::correlogramIterator(Pair pair,ScaleMode scale,int binSize,int timeframe);
01376 
01377     public:
01378     inline ~CorrelogramIterator(){};
01380     inline float next(){
01381       float value =  - (static_cast<float>(correlation->getValue(index)) / static_cast<float>(scale));
01382       index++;
01383       return value;
01384     };
01386     inline bool hasNext(){return (lastIndex >= index);};
01390     inline bool isDataAvailable(){return dataAvailable;};
01391 
01392     inline float getShoulder() const {return - correlation->getShoulder();};
01393 
01394     inline float getScaledShoulder() const {return - correlation->getShoulder() / static_cast<float>(scale);};
01395 
01396     inline float getFiringRate() const {return correlation->getFiringRate(); }; 
01397     private:
01398       inline CorrelogramIterator(const Data& d,Pair pair,ScaleMode scaleMode,int binSize,int timeframe):data(d){
01399         index = 0;
01400         lastIndex = -1;
01401         QDict<Correlation>* dict = data.correlationDict[pair.toString()];
01402         if(dict == 0) dataAvailable = false;
01403         else{
01404          Pair parameters = Pair(binSize,timeframe);
01405          correlation = (*dict)[parameters.toString()];
01406          if(correlation == 0) dataAvailable = false;
01407          else{
01408           if(correlation->getStatus(binSize,timeframe) == READY){
01409            dataAvailable = true;
01410            lastIndex = correlation->getNbBins() - 1;
01411            switch(scaleMode){
01412             case RAW:
01413               scale = 1;
01414               break;
01415             case MAX:
01416               scale = static_cast<float>(correlation->getMaximum());
01417               break;
01418             case SHOULDER:
01419               scale = correlation->getShoulder();
01420               break;
01421            }
01422           }
01423           else dataAvailable = false;
01424          } 
01425         }       
01426       };
01430       const Data& data;
01431       long index;
01432       long lastIndex;
01433       bool dataAvailable;
01434       Data::Correlation* correlation;
01435       float scale;
01436   };
